info.title: Volume I: NeXus User Manual

revdescription.para: Started conversion from the old NeXus mediawiki documentation.

Most of the content from the old NeXus mediawiki documentation is included. Some new wiki content has been introduced but should be easy to identify for inclusion in the manual. The manual is now divided into two volumes. Volume I is the User Manual, Volume II is the Reference Documentation.
